cast.original_title: 봄 여름 가을 겨울 그리고 봄
cast.overview: An isolated lake, where an old monk lives in a small floating temple. The monk has a young boy living with him, learning to become a monk. We watch as seasons and years pass by.
cast.title: Spring, Summer, Fall, Winter... and Spring

details.biography: Oh Young-soo (오영수) is a South Korean actor born on October 19, 1944 as O Se-kang (오세강). In 2021, he portrayed Oh Il-nam in the Netflix survival drama Squid Game, which gave rise to his worldwide popularity and won him a Golden Globe Award for Best Supporting Actor in a Series, Miniseries or Television Film, as well as a nomination for the Primetime Emmy Award for Outstanding Supporting Actor in a Drama Series.
details.name: Oh Young-soo
details.place_of_birth: Kaepung County, Gyeonggi, Empire of Japan [now Kaepung District, Kaesong, North Korea]
